title: account help
content:
Why does Firefox forget who I am?

I use the same computer every day for years and years, but Firefox forgets my settings every month or two.
creator: sxplay

title: Can't get on web site
content: Trying to get on a web site. But don't know how to do it?
creator: jenniferjaydant

title: Is it possible to create a shortcut to the notification manager?
content: Hi, When you click "settings" in notifications, in the privacy and security settings, a new window opens instead of a tab, so this setting has no URL of its own. In Chromium-based browsers they have the URL "*browser name*://settings/content/notifications", so I could add this URL to bookmarks and access it quickly. Is there any way to do something similar in Firefox? Thanks
creator: Chemitaa
